channel.title: Comments on: 1 Billion queries per minute and much more – free webinar on MySQL Cluster 7.2 GA
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: Art
item.dc:creator: Art
item.description:
I just wrote an article on my blog about the new GA. I wish I'd seen your blog beforehand. You could have been a great source. I'm looking forward to watching the recorded copy of your webinar when you post it. Please send me the link!
As far as MySQL Cluster 7.2 GA goes, I am going to be spec'ing it out with all of my customers in the near future.
item.content:encoded:
I just wrote an article on my blog about the new GA. I wish I’d seen your blog beforehand. You could have been a great source. I’m looking forward to watching the recorded copy of your webinar when you post it. Please send me the link!

As far as MySQL Cluster 7.2 GA goes, I am going to be spec’ing it out with all of my customers in the near future.

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/1-billion-queries-per-minute-and-much-more-free-webinar-on-mysql-cluster-7-2-ga#comment-579">aaron</a>.
I'll post the link to the recording here as soon as I have it.
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to aaron.

I’ll post the link to the recording here as soon as I have it.

Andrew.

item.title: By: aaron

item.description: I could not register in time, can you provide the link to the recording?
item.content:encoded: I could not register in time, can you provide the link to the recording?
